name: DigitalBridge Group, Inc.
description: DigitalBridge Group, Inc. is a leading global investment firm focused on digital infrastructure and real estate. Founded in 2020, the company seeks to capitalize on the burgeoning demand for digital connectivity and infrastructure needed for the modern economy. DigitalBridge specializes in the acquisition, development, and management of digital assets, including data centers, cell towers, and fiber networks. With an experienced management team and a strong track record in the digital investment space, DigitalBridge aims to provide superior risk-adjusted returns through a diversified portfolio of digital infrastructure investments. The company is committed to sustainable practices and innovation, leveraging technology to enhance operational efficiencies and improve the user experience across its properties. As the digital economy continues to expand, DigitalBridge is well-positioned to play a pivotal role in shaping the future of connectivity and digital real estate.

seo.meta_title: DigitalBridge Group, Inc. | Investing in Digital Infrastructure
seo.meta_description: Explore DigitalBridge Group, Inc., a leader in digital infrastructure investment. Discover our focus on data centers, cell towers, and fiber networks.

faq.question: What does DigitalBridge do?
faq.answer: DigitalBridge specializes in investing in digital infrastructure and real estate, focusing on data centers, cell towers, and fiber networks.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of DigitalBridge?
faq.answer: Marc Ganzi is the CEO of DigitalBridge Group, Inc.

faq.question: Where is DigitalBridge headquartered?
faq.answer: DigitalBridge is headquartered in Boca Raton, Florida, USA.
